data: SELECT id, seq, usercreate, userupdate, event, actionclass, actiondata, eventaction, jdbc, enabled, description FROM jnu_eventactions WHERE event IN (SELECT id FROM jnu_events WHERE component = '{id}') ORDER BY id

dependencies.data: SELECT sitename FROM jnu_sites WHERE sitename IN (SELECT site FROM jnu_projects WHERE id IN (SELECT project FROM jnu_components WHERE id = '{id}')) ORDER BY sitename
SELECT id, regdate, usercreate, site FROM jnu_projects WHERE id IN (SELECT project FROM jnu_components WHERE id = '{id}') ORDER BY id
SELECT id, description, driver, url, username, passwd, maxcon, usercreate, userupdate, site FROM jnu_jdbc WHERE id IN (SELECT jdbc FROM jnu_components WHERE id = '{id}') ORDER BY id
SELECT id, description, project, css, jshead, jsbody, usercreate, userupdate, title, showtitle, componenttype, jdbc, jsonobject, usecache FROM jnu_components WHERE id = '{id}' ORDER BY id

SELECT id, component, varname, label, showlabel, datatype, action, canbenull, valbyquery, valbydefault, size, placeholder, json, usercreate, userupdate, tabgroup, "column" FROM jnu_componentparts WHERE component = '{id}' ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, component, project, seq, conf, label FROM jnu_events WHERE component = '{id}' ORDER BY id
